text: A glass of Japanese Calpis A glass of Fanta melon soda A glass of German fassbrause A glass of ginger ale A glass of Swedish Julmust Kickapoo Joy Juice originated in the United States Orange soda Japanese Ramune Glasses of Red Bull Cola This is a list of soft drinks in order of the brand's country of origin. A soft drink is a beverage that typically contains water (often, but not always, carbonated water), usually a sweetener and usually a flavoring agent. The sweetener may be sugar, high-fructose corn syrup, fruit juice, sugar substitutes (in the case of diet drinks) or some combination of these. Soft drinks may also contain caffeine, colorings, preservatives and other ingredients.
